beginner.question: What part of speech is the word 'run' in 'I run every day'?
beginner.explanation: A verb shows action or state of being.

beginner.question: She ____ to school every day. (present simple)
beginner.explanation: Third person singular adds -es to the verb 'go'.

beginner.question: Identify the error: He go to the store yesterday.
Complete the sentence: The book is ___ the table.
What is a noun?
beginner.explanation: A noun names a person, place, thing, or idea.

beginner.question: He ____ a book. (present simple)
beginner.explanation: Third person singular adds -s to the verb 'read'.

beginner.question: Identify the error: She like pizza.
Complete: The cat is ___ the box.
What is an adjective?
beginner.explanation: An adjective describes or modifies a noun.

beginner.question: They ___ playing. (present continuous)
beginner.explanation: Plural subject uses 'are' with present participle.

beginner.question: What is a verb?
beginner.explanation: A verb expresses an action or state.

beginner.question: I ___ happy. (present simple)
Identify the error: He is eat an apple.
Complete: The dog is ___ the house.
What is an adverb?
beginner.explanation: An adverb describes how, when, or where.

beginner.question: We ___ friends. (present simple)
Identify the error: She have two cats.
Complete: The sun is ___ the sky.
What is the plural of 'child'?
You ___ tall. (present simple)
Identify the error: I goed to the park.
Complete: The bird is ___ the tree.
What is the past tense of 'eat'?
It ___ raining. (present continuous)
Identify the error: They plays football.
Complete: The car is ___ the garage.
What is a pronoun?
She ___ singing. (present continuous)
Identify the error: He do his homework.
Complete: The fish is ___ the water.
What is the comparative of 'big'?
I ___ eating. (present continuous)
Identify the error: We was happy.
Complete: The plane is ___ the clouds.
What is the superlative of 'small'?
They ___ running. (present continuous)
Identify the error: She goed home.
Complete: The book is ___ the shelf.
What is a preposition?
beginner.explanation: A preposition shows relationship of position.

beginner.question: He ___ sleeping. (present continuous)
Identify the error: I has a dog.
Complete: The ball is ___ the floor.
What is the past tense of 'see'?
We ___ dancing. (present continuous)
Identify the error: You was here.
Complete: The cat is ___ the mat.
What is a conjunction?
beginner.explanation: A conjunction connects words or clauses.

beginner.question: It ___ sunny. (present simple)
Identify the error: They have go.
Complete: The pen is ___ the desk.
What is the plural of 'man'?
She ___ crying. (present continuous)
Identify the error: He like apples.
Complete: The boy is ___ the door.
What is the past tense of 'drink'?
I ___ walking. (present continuous)
Identify the error: She has eat.
Complete: The girl is ___ the park.
What is an interjection?
You ___ smiling. (present continuous)
Identify the error: We goed there.
Complete: The teacher is ___ the classroom.
What is the comparative of 'good'?
They ___ sitting. (present continuous)
Identify the error: I was goed.
Complete: The apple is ___ the tree.
What is the superlative of 'bad'?
He ___ reading. (present continuous)
Identify the error: She do it.
Complete: The dog is ___ the yard.

intermediate.question: Which word is a comparative adjective: bigger, big, biggest?
She is ____ than her sister. (tall)
Identify the error: He don't like apples.
Complete: I have been waiting ___ an hour.
What is the past tense of 'go'?
If I ___ rich, I would travel. (conditional)
Identify the error: She have a car.
Complete: He is good ___ math.
Which is a superlative: faster, fast, fastest?
They have ___ here for two hours.
What is the past participle of 'write'?
She has ___ the book. (read)
Identify the error: I have saw the movie.
Complete: He is interested ___ music.
What is the present perfect of 'eat'?
We have ___ dinner. (eat)
Identify the error: She has went home.
Complete: They are afraid ___ spiders.
What is the future tense of 'be'?
I will ___ happy. (be)
Identify the error: He will goes tomorrow.
Complete: She is famous ___ her singing.
What is the passive voice of 'They build houses'?
The cake ___ baked by my mother. (is)
Identify the error: The letter was wrote by him.
Complete: He is responsible ___ the project.
What is the conditional of 'If I have money'?
intermediate.explanation: Second conditional uses past tense for unreal present.

intermediate.question: If she ___ here, she would help. (be)
intermediate.explanation: Subjunctive 'were' for all subjects in unreal conditions.

intermediate.question: Identify the error: If he comes, I will go.
intermediate.explanation: First conditional is correct for real future.

intermediate.question: Complete: We are looking ___ the keys.
What is the gerund of 'run'?
He enjoys ___ in the park. (run)
Identify the error: Swimming is fun.
Complete: She is bad ___ cooking.
What is the infinitive of 'to go'?
intermediate.explanation: Base form; 'to' makes it full infinitive.

intermediate.question: I want ___ home. (go)
Identify the error: He decided to study.
Complete: They agreed ___ the plan.
What is the past continuous of 'sing'?
She ___ singing when I arrived. (was)
Identify the error: He was eat dinner.
Complete: I am tired ___ working.
What is the future perfect of 'finish'?
intermediate.explanation: Will have + past participle for completed future action.

intermediate.question: By next year, I ___ my degree. (will have finished)
intermediate.explanation: Future perfect for action completed before another future time.

intermediate.question: Identify the error: She will have finish by then.
Complete: He is capable ___ doing it.
What is the subjunctive mood in 'I suggest that he go'?
intermediate.explanation: Base form in subjunctive for suggestions.

intermediate.question: I insist that she ___ here. (be)
Identify the error: It's important that he is here.
Complete: She apologized ___ being late.
What is the reported speech of 'He said, "I am happy."'?
options: He said that he was happy.
He said that he is happy.
He says that he was happy.
He said that I am happy.
intermediate.answer: He said that he was happy.

intermediate.question: She told me that she ___ happy. (was)
Identify the error: He said that he is tired.
Complete: I am excited ___ the trip.
What is the causative form of 'have' in 'I had my car repaired'?
I will ___ my hair cut. (have)
Identify the error: She got her car repair.
Complete: He is addicted ___ coffee.
What is the phrasal verb 'give up'?
Don't ___ hope. (give up)
Identify the error: He looked up the word.
Complete: She takes ___ her mother.
What is the modal verb in 'You should study'?
You ___ eat vegetables. (should)
Identify the error: He can sings well.
Complete: It might ___ rain tomorrow.
What is the relative pronoun in 'The man who lives here'?
This is the house ___ I grew up. (that)
Identify the error: The book which I read was good.
Complete: She is the girl ___ I met yesterday.
What is the indirect object in 'Give me the book'?
He gave ___ the money. (me)
Identify the error: She told I the story.
Complete: I explained ___ the problem.
What is the participle in 'Having eaten, he left'?
___ finished, she went home. (having)
Identify the error: Eating dinner, he watched TV.
Complete: ___ arrived, we started.
What is the appositive in 'My friend John is here'?
Paris, ___ capital of France, is beautiful. (the)
Identify the error: He is a teacher, which is interesting.
Complete: She bought a car, ___ was expensive.
What is the idiom 'kick the bucket' mean?
He ___ the bucket last year. (kicked)
Identify the error: She spilled the beans.
Complete: Don't ___ the boat.
What is the synonym of 'happy'?
She is very ___. (joyful)
Identify the error: He is very glad.
Complete: I am ___ to meet you.
intermediate.explanation: Synonym for happy in this context.

intermediate.question: What is the antonym of 'big'?
The room is ___. (small)
Identify the error: It is tiny.
Complete: The elephant is ___ .

advanced.question: Identify the clause: 'Although it was raining, we went out.'
If I ___ you, I would study harder. (conditional)
Identify the error: She said me that she was tired.
advanced.explanation: Indirect object pronoun incorrect; use 'told me'.

advanced.question: Correct: The man which car is red is my friend.
advanced.answer: The man whose car is red is my friend.

advanced.question: What is reported speech for 'He said, "I am tired."'?
options: He said that he was tired.
He said that he is tired.
He says that he is tired.
He said that he is tired.
advanced.answer: He said that he was tired.

advanced.question: By the time she arrives, we ___ dinner. (future perfect)
advanced.explanation: Future perfect for completed action before future time.

advanced.question: Identify the error: I wish I can fly.
Correct: She don't know the answer, which is surprising.
advanced.answer: She doesn't know the answer, which is surprising.

advanced.question: Identify the idiom: 'Break a leg'
advanced.explanation: Idiom meaning good luck, especially in performance.

advanced.question: The meeting was postponed ___ the bad weather.
What is the subjunctive in 'It is essential that she be here'?
advanced.explanation: Base form in subjunctive for necessity.

advanced.question: I recommend that he ___ the job. (take)
Identify the error: It's necessary that he comes.
Correct: He insisted that I payed him.
advanced.answer: He insisted that I paid him.

advanced.question: What is the inversion in 'Never have I seen such beauty'?
___ I ever forget this day. (never will)
Identify the error: Seldom does he come here.
Correct: Not only did he come, but also he brought gifts.
advanced.answer: Not only did he come, but he also brought gifts.

advanced.question: What is the cleft sentence for 'She gave me the book'?
options: It was she who gave me the book.
She gave the book to me.
The book was given by her.
She who gave me the book.
advanced.answer: It was she who gave me the book.

advanced.question: It was ___ who solved the problem. (he)
Identify the error: It was the dog that barked.
Correct: What he did was surprising.
What is the ellipsis in 'He is taller than I'?
She sings better than he ___. (does)
Identify the error: He is richer than me.
Correct: He is taller than I.
advanced.answer: He is taller than I am.
advanced.explanation: Complete the ellipsis for formal English.

advanced.question: What is the fronting in 'Beautiful is the garden'?
advanced.explanation: Adjective moved to front for emphasis.

advanced.question: ___ are the stars tonight. (bright)
Identify the error: Loud was the thunder.
Correct: Happy were the children.
What is the nominalization of 'decide'?
His ___ surprised everyone. (decide)
Identify the error: The implementation was successful.
Correct: They made a decide.
What is the collocation 'heavy rain'?
It was ___ last night. (heavy rain)
Identify the error: Strong coffee is good.
Correct: He made a strong rain.
What is the phrasal verb 'look after' mean?
advanced.explanation: Multi-word verb meaning take care of.

advanced.question: Please ___ the children. (look after)
Identify the error: She takes care of her sister.
Correct: He looks the house after.
advanced.explanation: Correct word order for phrasal verb.

advanced.question: What is the metaphor in 'Time is a thief'?
advanced.explanation: Figure of speech comparing unlike things.

advanced.question: Life is a ___. (journey)
Identify the error: She is a shining star.
Correct: He is a busy bee.
What is the simile in 'As brave as a lion'?
She sings ___ an angel. (like)
Identify the error: He is as strong as ox.
Correct: He is as strong as an ox.
advanced.answer: He is as strong as an ox.

advanced.question: What is the alliteration in 'Peter Piper picked'?
___ and ___ went to sea. (Jack Jill)
Identify the error: Sally sells seashells.
Correct: She sells sea shells.
What is the oxymoron in 'deafening silence'?
It was a ___ defeat. (bitter sweet)
Identify the error: Jumbo shrimp are small.
Correct: The living dead walked.
What is the hyperbole in 'I'm so hungry I could eat a horse'?
He is ___ tall. (as tall as)
Identify the error: She cried a river.
Correct: He is older than Methuselah.
What is the personification in 'The wind whispered'?
Time ___ all wounds. (heals)
Identify the error: The flowers danced in the breeze.
Correct: Opportunity knocked at the door.
What is the onomatopoeia in 'buzz'?
The bee went ___. (buzz)
Identify the error: The clock ticked loudly.
Correct: The door creaked open.
What is the irony in 'A fire station burns down'?
The police station was ___. (robbed)
Identify the error: A doctor smokes.
Correct: The lifeguard drowned.
What is the pun in 'Time flies like an arrow'?
She has a ___ personality. (magnetic)
Identify the error: He is a real character.
Correct: She broke his heart.
What is the euphemism for 'died'?
He ___ peacefully. (passed away)
Identify the error: He kicked the bucket.
Correct: He is no longer with us.
advanced.answer: He is no longer with us.

advanced.question: What is the understatement in 'It's a bit chilly' for freezing?
The disaster was ___ described. (under)
Identify the error: The storm was quite windy.
Correct: It was a minor setback.
What is the synecdoche in 'All hands on deck'?
The ___ are hungry. (company)
Identify the error: The White House issued a statement.
Correct: Wheels are turning.
What is the metonymy in 'The pen is mightier than the sword'?
The ___ declared war. (crown)
Identify the error: Hollywood produces movies.
Correct: The suits decided.
What is the anaphora in 'I have a dream...'?
___ shall not perish. (we)
Identify the error: To be or not to be.
Correct: Ask not what your country can do for you.
advanced.answer: Ask not what your country can do for you.

advanced.question: What is the chiasmus in 'Ask not what your country can do for you, ask what you can do for your country'?
advanced.explanation: Reversal of structure in parallel clauses.

advanced.question: Live simply so that others may ___. (simply live)
Identify the error: She sells seashells by the seashore.
Correct: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
advanced.answer: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
